notes.text: Core: support asynchronous loading of libraries
Date: Persian calendar support
Enhance messages for descriptions to be used in MessagePopover
Icon Font optimizations: Add woff2/woff, optimize ttf
New Theme: sap_belize_hcb
New Theme: sap_belize_hcw
Opa5.createPageObject - takes a viewName now
Sorter: Provide a getter for the group function
Switch theme to Belize for tutorials
UniversalDate: Implement getWeek/setWeek
core/Configuration: Passing Format settings through proprietary URL parameters
core/Router: Option to mark Route as home
core/Service: configurable loading mode
sap.m.Label get required property from control
sap.m.RatingIndicator control padding changed
sap.m.RatingIndicator: padding depend on icon size
sap.ui.core.Component: Multi origin support for annotations
sap.ui.core.UIComponent#getRootControl - new function to get the created content of an UI Component
sap.ui.test.Opa - slow OPA added a URL parameter 'opaExecutionDelay' to slow down OPA
sap.ui.test.Opa5 - waitFors in actions
sap.ui.test.Opa5#waitFor - autoWait a new Property to handle synchronization issues in OPA tests
AnalyticalBinding - Wrong MultiUnit Keys
CLDR: Wrong short million in Arabic language
Configuration: setRTL must not ignore the new value
Core: Add JSDoc for "themeChanged" Event
Databinding tutorial rewrite step 9
Device.js: Fix Resizing
ListBinding: Detect updates if grouping is enabled
ManagedObject: Avoid mismatch of context and model
ManagedObject: document type of oContext in setBindingContext

MessageManager: Correct Message Sorting Before Propagation
MockServer read operation with Edm.Boolean key property

OPA - automatic waiting for setTimeout

OPA was sometimes failing to start an IFrame in firefox when mockserver was present
Opa#autoWait - disable it for starting/teardown functions
Opa5 autoWait is waiting for Microtasks
Remove IE9/IE10 specific code from sap.ui.core and sap.ui.demokit
TreeBindingAdapter - SelectAll
base.ManagedObject: don't ignore wrong context
changes-1.42.json: remove duplicates
core.DateFormat: date parsed wrongly when pm/am appears before time

core.Popup: new position isn't applied in RTL after popup is opened
core.Popup: remove visible shieldlayer when destroy popup
core.Popup: should keep focus for non-recently-opened modal popup
core.TooltipBase: show parent control tooltip if no tooltip on child
core.UIComponent: improve JSDoc for createContent, esp. @returns
core/Router: back navigation from target without title
jQuery.sap.encoder: Check host names in validateUrl
jQuery.sap.events: avoid endless loop when setting mark on an event

jQuery.sap.properties: reduce processing memory and heap
jQuery.sap.strings: JSDoc return types, JSDoc best practices
mvc/View.Preprocessor: getCacheKey documentation
mvc/View: corrected preprocessor viewInfo object
mvc/XMLView: cache fail does not break view processing
sap.m.Carousel:  Nested carousels are now working correctly
sap.m.Carousel: Nested carousels are now working correctly
sap.ui.base.ManagedObject: fix typo in .removeAggregation() documentation
sap.ui.core.format.DateFormat: fallback format by using given pattern without delimiters
sap.ui.core.theming.Parameters: Correctly rewrite  relative urls
sap.ui.model.Context: There is no parameter oContext on constructor
sap.ui.table.Table HCB fixes
sap.ui.table.Table fixes
sap.ui.table.Table hcb fixes
sap.ui.test.OPA - waits for any nav container navigation/Rerenderings now

sap.ui.test.actions.Press - m.Input's value help is triggered
sap.ui.test.gherkin - don't load QUnit if it is already loaded via script
v2.ODataContextBinding: Detect navigation property changes
v2.ODataListBinding - Endless Change-Event Loop
v2.ODataModel: bindElement status code 204

ClientTreeBindingAdapter: Build tree for selection changes

sap.ui.core.Popup: keep blocklayer when there's still modal popup open
sap.ui.test.action.Press Link default behavior is executed
v2.ODataTreeBinding: Relative Binding

v2.ODataModel: empty request - setProperty on complex type

Avoid unguarded access to window.localStorage during bootstrap

XMLView: Prevent preserve of destroyed views DOM
mvc/Controller: support controller extension in factory function
v2.ODataModel: Don't try to reload created entities
BusyIndicator (Global): Fix missing wait cursor

TreeBindingAdapter: SelectAll
core.Popup: event handler should be moved to new DOM of autoclose area after rendering

sap.m.Carousel: Mouse swipe now works correctly

sap.ui.core.Popup: check the validity of document.activeElement

v2.ODataAnnotations.js: Improve robustness of the annotations loaded method

v2.ODataModel: Don't cache failed metadata object

jquery: prevent auto-detection of content type
